title: Valiamcep Womens Summer Dresses Square Neck Short Sleeve Ribbed Knit Slim Fitted Basic Bodycon Mini Pencil Dress
description: Material: This Valiamcep Square Neck Dress is made of soft, comfy ribbed fabric, Skin friendly and the right thickness. The interior adopts a fleece technique for Lightweight and keeping warm. The bodycon Midi dress is high stretchy, knitted fabric, soft touching.

Feature: Long Sleeve Dresses/Square Neck Dress/Bodycon Mini Dresses/Mini Dresses for Women/Ribbed Knit Dress/Stretchy Dress/Solid Color Dress/Winter Dress/Fall Dresses for Women/Plain Dresses/Black Dresses for Women/Pencil Dresses/Dating Night Dress/Going Out Dresses/Casual Dresses for Women

Design: This long sleeve dress combines comfy and fashion,chic and classy,sexy square neck design accentuates your collarbone , providing elegance without revealing too much skin and helps you create a sexy fall Casual Vibes. Great slimming fit cut, the super stretchy to avoid tightness,but great to wrap your body and make it more flattering,perfectly even to be a maternity dress,snug fitting great to show your curvy.

Collocation and Occasion: Essential trendy solid color mini dress can be matched with most fashion items in your wardrobe, great to pair with handbag, high heels, necklaces, suit, canvas shoe, sandal. Perfect for a homecoming, night out, party, club, wedding, streetwear, daily life,dating, Cocktail, thanksgiving, christmas, halloween, new year evening.
Garment Care: Machine wash with laundry bag recommended, Hand wash cold, do not bleach or iron, Hang or linedry. Please wash dark clothes and light colors separately to avoid staining.
